pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Tests for invalid attribute values and attributes appearing in elements that they're not supposed to.
There's a multitude of invalid attribute values and combinations. We only consider a few sane cases that are likely to happen: - type attribute in upstream maintainer (allowed only in downstream) - status attribute in downstream maintainer (allowed only in upstream) - invalid values for enumerated attributes: type, status, lang
We also introduce multiple violations in a single element to test repoman's ability to display errors.
